Articles.Content:
Things just keep getting better 'n better!

http://www.ign.com/articles/2014/10/28/marvel-confirms-movies-for-black-panther-captain-marvel-more

Hm...I have a feeling that Infinity War will be about the Infinity Gauntlet, and either Thanos or Adam Warlock would be the villain. It could also include more of those Cosmic Cubes like the one they had in the first Avengers movie. Now I need to get thinking on who would make a good Adam Warlock...

Now, Thor: Ragnarok is interesting. Interesting because it happens during the Civil War, which is possibly the setting for the Captain America movie. I'm not sure how it will all play out, since The Avengers was created AFTER the evens of the Civil War, but it'll be interesting to see what happens. I was never really a big Thor fan but if memory serves, Ragnarok is a clone of Thor created by Tony Stark. I'm even more interested in Age of Ultron now, since apparently Thor is supposed to disappear before Ragnarok is created.

Either way, I wish DC would have come out with their stuff sooner. I can't wait for the Justice League films. I just hope they don't have Superman kill someone (I mean, what were those dumb writers thinking?), and I hope they pull characters from the TV shows.
Oh please other film companies, do the right thing and let Marvel have Spiderman and Wolverine (erm I mean X-Men) back...
